H0.text: Mr Worldly Wisemen appears in which 17th Century book. The Pilgrim's Progress

H1.text: Mr Worldly Wisemen appears in which 17th Century book. Robinson Crusoe

H2.text: Mr Worldly Wisemen appears in which 17th Century book. Paradise Lost

H3.text: Mr Worldly Wisemen appears in which 17th Century book. Timorous

A4.text: The Pilgrim's Progress from This World, to That Which Is to Come is a 1678 Christian allegory written by John Bunyan.

A5.text: Worldly Wiseman has brought down many innocent pilgrims and there will be many more to come.
